data.chText: 他们从上学时期以来就是最要好的朋友。
data.enText: They've been best mates since school.

data.chText: （男人之间常用）哥儿们，伙计，老兄
data.enText: used as a friendly way of addressing sb, especially between men
Sorry mate, you'll have to wait.

data.chText: 同伴；同事；一同居住的人
data.enText: a person you share an activity or accommodation with

data.chText: 工友；队友；游戏伙伴；同学
我的室友；和我同住一套公寓的人

data.enText: either of a pair of birds or animals
A male bird sings to attract a mate.
a husband, wife or other sexual partner
a person whose job is to help a skilled worker

data.chText: 建筑工的 / 管子工的助手

data.enText: an officer in a commercial ship below the rank of captain or master
to have sex in order to produce young
Do foxes ever mate with dogs?
to put animals or birds together so that they will have sex and produce young

means: (男人之间常用)哥儿们，伙计，老兄

tr: a chess move constituting an inescapable and indefensible attack on the opponent's king

example: when a match is found an entry is made in the notebook

tr: South American tea-like drink made from leaves of a South American holly called mate
the officer below the master on a commercial ship
informal term for a friend of the same sex
the partner of an animal (especially a sexual partner)
example: he loved the mare and all her mates

tr: a fellow member of a team
example: it was his first start against his former teammates

tr: leaves used in making a drink like tea

example: he lost the mate to his shoe
one eye was blue but its fellow was brown

tr: place an opponent's king under an attack from which it cannot escape and thus ending the game
example: Kasparov checkmated his opponent after only a few moves

tr: bring two objects, ideas, or people together
example: This fact is coupled to the other one
Matchmaker, can you match my daughter with a nice young man?
The student was paired with a partner for collaboration on the project

value.def: You can refer to someone's friends as their mates, especially when you are talking about a man and his male friends.

example.ex: He's off drinking with his mates...
example.tran: 他跟哥儿们出去喝酒了。

example.ex: A mate of mine used to play soccer for Liverpool.
example.tran: 我的一个朋友在利物浦队踢过球。

value.tran: 伙伴，朋友(尤指男性之间)

value.def: Some men use mate as a way of addressing other men when they are talking to them.

example.ex: Come on mate, things aren't that bad.
example.tran: 别灰心，兄弟，事情没那么糟。

value.tran: (用于男性之间的称呼)老兄，老弟

value.def: Someone's wife, husband, or sexual partner can be referred to as their mate .

example.ex: He has found his  ideal mate.
...as women do become as powerful in the marketplace as their mates.
example.tran: 随着女人在商界的确变得和男人一样强大

value.def: An animal's mate is its sexual partner.

example.ex: The males guard their mates zealously.
example.tran: 雄性动物死死地守护着他们的配偶。

value.def: When animals mate, a male and a female have sex in order to produce young.

example.ex: This allows the pair to mate properly and stops the hen staying in the nest-box...
example.tran: 这样可以使这对公鸡和母鸡正常交配，让母鸡不再呆在鸡窝里。

example.ex: They want the males to mate with wild females...
example.tran: 他们希望这些雄性动物可以和野生的雌性动物交配。

example.ex: It is easy to tell when a female is ready to mate.
example.tran: 雌性动物何时准备交配一目了然。

value.def: On a commercial ship, the mate or the first mate is the most important officer except for the captain. Officers of lower rank are also called mates .
In the United States Navy, a mate is a petty officer who has a particular set of skills and who assists a warrant officer.
In chess, mate is the same as checkmate .

trans: 咖啡伴侣；咖啡伴侶；奶精；咖啡奶粉
配偶杀伤细胞；接合致死者
(美国)竞选伙伴；(尤指)副总统候选人
